original_title: Bob Iger: Making the Mouse Roar
overview: In his only UK broadcast interview, Disney’s chief executive Bob Iger talks to the BBC’s media editor Amol Rajan about his ride of a lifetime. From Star Wars to the streaming wars, and from negotiating with Rupert Murdoch to buy 21st Century Fox, to how his close friendship with Apple’s Steve Jobs came about, the most powerful man in Hollywood explains the trends shaping global media.
title: Bob Iger: Making the Mouse Roar
